content: crochet your own advent calendar this crochet pattern bundle has instructions to make 27 crochet patterns including a tree wall hanging 25 christmas/winter themed appliqués and a pouch to hold all the appliqués when they re not hung up hang the tree wall hanging up and starting december 1 add one appliqué onto the tree a day until christmas this is a fun way for kids to countdown to christmas or just a fun holiday activity you can also just make the wall hanging and use as a wall decoration year round use the pouch as a gift bag for the holidays and make the appliqués to sew on projects or hang as christmas tree decorations the possibilities are endless you will receive 4 pdf files - tree wall hanging written crochet pattern - tree wall hanging graph - pouch written crochet pattern - 25 christmas & winter themed appliqués language - english / standard us terms difficulty- advanced beginner patterns include - gauge pattern - written instructions for all 27 patterns - links to free video tutorials supplies needed - medium 4 weight yarn - 3 75mm f & 5 00mm h crochet hooks - 25 - 16mm buttons - 24 wooden dowel - 6mm black safety eyes - red and black embroidery thread - yarn needle and scissors --------------------------------------------------------- you are more than welcome to sell your finished items but please give the turtle trunk credit as pattern designer my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern due to the electronic nature of this pattern we cannot offer refunds or exchanges
